THUMBNAIL-TITLE RELATIONSHIP.Visual reinforcement: The thumbnail directly visualizes the video's provocative question: a splash of liquid is shown from a person on a bed with vivid text ('IS IT PEE??') referencing the topic. The presence of a woman in medical scrubs supports the promise of expertise in the title ('Urologist Reveals The Truth'). The shocked expression on her face visually amplifies the controversial/curious nature of the topic.
THUMBNAIL-TITLE RELATIONSHIP.Contrasts/mismatches: There is no significant mismatch; the thumbnail is a strong visual summary of the title. However, the sensational, almost playful style contrasts slightly with the scientific/medical framing suggested by 'urologist reveals.'
